Key Match Events: Rafael Devers hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning
Brayan Bello felt Cole showed a lot of weakness in intentionally walking Devers
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Aaron Boone felt the decision to intentionally walk Devers was overthought
Pitching coach Matt Blake and Gerrit Cole discussed intentionally walking Devers under certain conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Gerrit Cole said the intentional walk was a mistake
Alex Cora believed Cole hit Devers on purpose in the first at-bat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Red Sox scored seven runs against Gerrit Cole
Gerrit Cole allowed three hits, one walk, and hit two batters in the fifth inning
